Class WebpageRuntime

A IRuntime implementation for web page runs inside browser.

Private handleMouseEvent

  • handleMouseEvent(type: string, stage: Stage, e: any): void
    • Defined in runtime/WebpageRuntime.ts:161

    Handles mouse event, translate the coordinate to stage space and send to stage instance.

    Parameters

    • type: string

      Type of the mouse event.

    • stage: Stage

      The stage to receive this event.

    • e: any

    Returns void

  • handleTouchEvent(type: string, stage: Stage, e: any): void
